pullRequest.title: NXP-29689: fix null version for copied documents

nodes.bodyText:
In fact, is there any point in versioning the created document and verifying its version numbers?
Aren't we only interested in the copied document in this test?

This line is not needed since you're directly manipulating the output document of the Automation service call (not passing through the HTTP layer to execute the operation then re-fetching the document afterwards).

nodes.bodyText: Please start the method name with test instead of check. This makes it easier when navigating or searching to isolate test methods from others, and is the convention we have in most of our code.
